#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t,z=1,x,y,u,n,f;
    cin>>t;
    while(z<=t)
    {
               cin>>n;
               u=(sqrt(1+8*n)-1)/2;
               if(u%2==1)
               {
                         x=u;
                         y=1;
                         if(u*(u+1)/2==n)
                         {
                                         cout<<"("<<y<<","<<x<<")"<<endl;
                         }
                         else
                         {
                             x++;
                             f=n-u*(u+1)/2-1;
                             x-=f;
                             y+=f;
                             cout<<"("<<y<<","<<x<<")"<<endl;
                         }
               }
               else
               {
                         x=1;
                         y=u;
                         if(u*(u+1)/2==n)
                         {
                                         cout<<"("<<y<<","<<x<<")"<<endl;
                         }
                         else
                         {
                             y++;
                             f=n-u*(u+1)/2-1;
                             x+=f;
                             y-=f;
                             cout<<"("<<y<<","<<x<<")"<<endl;
                         }
               }
               z++;
    }
    //getch();
    return(0);
}
